name: Reach 1 as Quick as Possible
description:
Give an algorithm that takes an integer k (k > 0) as parameter, and returns the minimum
number of steps needed to convert k to 1. In each step, one can apply one of the operations
given below:

• Divide by three. This operation can be applied only if the number is divisible by three.

• Divide by two. This operation can be applied only if the number is divisible by two.

• Subtract one

**Code size must be less than 116 characters.**

**Code must be one line.**

TESTS:

- Easy: 1 to 100
- Normal: 500 to 2000
- Hard: 2000 to 10000
- Insane: 10^6 to 10^7
- Unhuman: 10^50 to 10^51
